recommendations: Inderpal Singh ‚ÄúPreksha has been an enthusiastic student who has shown keenness to keep learning and improving her skill-sets. She is a part of the Social Media Marketing Student Committee at JIMS, Jaipur and has done a good job in maintaining and managing the social media pages. She is a creative person and comes up with good ideas to make posts more engaging. If she is to make a career in Social Media Marketing, she would do well and would also be an asset to the organization she becomes a part of. ‚Äù
